TopicTitle: Faster Voltage Mod (In development) need engines and etc.

Articles.Content:
Faster Voltage mod 2.0

The Faster Voltage mod is a mod that has been in development for a Month now and i need somebody who is great with textures

at this stage of development it has:

1. 6 meter tanks

2. adapters

3. 5 meter, 3.75 meter, and soon 4 meter

4. Suprise's

I am adding a HyperDrive, and another Solar System for you to visit (i know its allot of work so don't say that it is) later on there will be multiable types and i have planed to add 2 more game mode's they are:

1. Star Wars

2. Star Trek (have no idea what star trek is about)

After i release the mod, you will be able to add something into it if you want.

and i'll upload it onto spaceport once done coding/generating and working around dating (have a girlfriend just got to get her mom to allow her to date)

Edited October 16, 2013 by pat8996

I think I could do some textures,but I'm not pro at it or something.Could you please show me your parts so I know in which style I have to do them?

(I didn't said that I will,I just said that I could).
The addon releases board is for releases, moved this here until you have something to release.
It is the release I'm working on getting it uploaded right now (types on new Rt tablet )

Well togfox, it's version 0.1 for 0.21 and currently it adds fueltanks, engines(currently only 1 from novapunch will be removed in less I get good commets on it), adapters, decouplers, and a few surprises but, there are a couple bugs with the engines and the experimental engines are going to be very green.
I have the parts but all most are experimental and I'm going to post the parts up on mediafire and pm the link to ya matinVD

*MartinVD.And also do you got a permission to use the NovaPunch engine?

EDIT: Why did you put in so many parts from other packs? And why did you named one engine GoyouF*CKER??? I'm sorry but this is riddicilous.
